attributes.action: Increase school transport funding for 8 to 11 years olds in full time education
attributes.additional_details:
The Council is reviewing (cutting back) its home to school/college travel arrangements to ensure they continue to deliver their statutory responsibilities to meet the travel needs of children and young people to access education. 

https://www.surreysays.co.uk/csf/home-to-school-college-travel-and-transport-policy/

The Council’s decision is in early 2020 on a new Home to School/College Travel and Transport Policy.
attributes.background: The Council is trying to reduce funding for 8 year olds and for children under 5 years old. Please sign this petition to keep/improve The Home to School Transport Policy and help us to reduce traffic between villages, parking issues and improve the environment.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
